sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>allocate</radical> radical and the <kanji>allocate</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: If you <kanji>allocate</kanji> your funds correctly you'll be able to buy as many precious <reading>jew</reading>els (<ja>じゅう</ja>) as you want! However, jewels are expensive, so if you don't allocate any money, you won't be able to afford any. Ever.
readingInfo: Picture all the jewels you were able to buy because you allocated your funds correctly. Imagine swimming in these jewels. Like a rich duck.
